description: Summer House provides in-patient substance abuse detox and treatment. Helps with alcohol detox, and detox from: Heroin, Methadone, Oxy-Contin, Suboxone, Benzodiazepine, Xanax, Valium, and Cocaine. Summer House is an in-patient substance abuse center. Our mission is to make the detoxification process comfortable by giving the person a strong liquid narcotic cocktail in reducing doses every four hours during your stay in a controlled environment until they are clean.
name: SUMMER HOUSE DETOX CENTER, LLC.
